meanings.definition: The edge or border of something.
meanings.sent1: The cat walked along the marges of the garden.
meanings.sent2: She doodled in the marges of her notebook during class.
meanings.sent3: The butterfly danced near the marges of the flower bed.
meanings.sent4: The stars sparkled at the marges of the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The waves crashed against the marges of the shore.

meanings.definition: A margin or space at the edge of a page.
meanings.sent1: He scribbled notes in the marges of his textbook.
meanings.sent2: The teacher wrote comments in the marges of the essay.
meanings.sent3: The doodle in the marges of the paper looked like a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: The ink smudged at the marges of the page.
meanings.sent5: The bookmark peeked out from the marges of the book.

meanings.sent1: The fence marked the marges of the property.
meanings.sent2: They reached the marges of the forest after a long hike.
meanings.sent3: The cake was frosted right to the marges of the pan.
meanings.sent4: His patience was at the marges of running out.
meanings.sent5: The marathon tested the marges of her endurance.
